scripts.build-rust: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --target nodejs --out-dir pkg ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/glsl_types.wasm
scripts.rename-cjs: for file in pkg/*.js; do mv "$file" "${file%.js}.cjs"; done
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-rust && npm run rename-cjs && npm run cp-pkg
scripts.update-cli: npm unlink -g glsl-types && npm run build && npm link
